Uses of Interface
org.fax4j.util.Connection

Packages that use Connection
org.fax4j.spi.comm Provides the COMM port communication based fax client SPI implementation. 
org.fax4j.spi.email Provides the email based fax client SPI implementation. 
org.fax4j.util Provides general utilities used internally by the fax4j library. 
 

Uses of Connection in org.fax4j.spi.comm
 

Methods in org.fax4j.spi.comm that return Connection
protected  Connection<CommPortAdapter> CommFaxClientSpi.createCommPortConnection()
          Creates and returns the COMM port connection to be used.
protected  Connection<CommPortAdapter> CommFaxClientSpi.getCommPortConnection()
          Returns the COMM port connection to be used.
 

Uses of Connection in org.fax4j.spi.email
 

Methods in org.fax4j.spi.email that return Connection
protected  Connection<MailResourcesHolder> AbstractMailFaxClientSpi.createMailConnection()
          Creates and returns the mail connection to be used to send the fax via mail.
protected  Connection<MailResourcesHolder> AbstractMailFaxClientSpi.getMailConnection()
          Returns the mail connection to be used to send the fax via mail.
 

Methods in org.fax4j.spi.email with parameters of type Connection
protected  void AbstractMailFaxClientSpi.closeMailConnection(Connection<MailResourcesHolder> mailConnection)
          This function closes the provided mail connection.
protected  void AbstractMailFaxClientSpi.sendMail(FaxJob faxJob, Connection<MailResourcesHolder> mailConnection, javax.mail.Message message)
          This function will send the mail message.
